   sphinx-quickstart on Sat Mar 27 16:10:20 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Open Digital Architecture - Canvas
=================================================

This contains documentation on the ODA environment specification, ODA reference implementation and canvas installation that are part of the Open Digital Architecture - Component Accelerator (ODA-CA) project.
The ODA-CA is a reference implementation of the `IG1171 Component Definition <https://www.tmforum.org/resources/exploratory-report/ig1171-oda-component-definition-r19-0-0/>`_


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   README.md
   Specification.md
   Installation.md
